message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to get a high-quality item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm thinking of a price of $15000 for it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. Can you meet me there?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm not sure I can meet you at $11000. I can offer you a compromise at $13500, but I'm willing to go up to $14000 if you're really interested in making a deal.
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $11000 is a more fair price. Can you meet me there?

I understand you're still interested in the product, Bob, but I'm not willing to go down to $11000. I can offer you a slight discount, but I think a fair price would be $13000. If you're still interested, I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13250
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think $12000 is the maximum I'm willing to pay. Can you accept this price?

I'm glad you're willing to meet me halfway, Bob! However, I'm not sure I can accept $12000. I can offer you a slight discount from my previous offer, so how about $12500? I'm willing to compromise, but I think this is the lowest I can go
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still at $12000. Can you meet me there?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! However, I've already compromised a lot and I'm not willing to go below $13000. I can offer you a final deal at $13000, but I'm not sure I can go any lower
I've made a lot of concessions, and I'm still willing to meet you at $12000. This is my final offer. Can you accept it?
